xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/454746-Di Padre in Figlia 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kHQ4VakmEQLuDtXZngpuX4dyecm.jpg A mini-series depicting female emancipation in the history of a Venetian family, the Franzas. Set in Bassano where the patriarch of the family owns a distillery producing Grappa, Giovanni's family comprises of his wife Franca and their four children, Maria Teresa, Elena, Sofia and Antonio. During 1958-1985 they must overcome private and familial struggles. Di Padre in Figlia
